plot: Amelie thinks to the story behind her daughter's father, Francois: she cheated on him with Stephan, in the moment of Francois' accidental death. She will always make her believe her father is Francois.
title: Demain
plot_es: Amelie thinks to the story behind her daughter's father, Francois: she cheated on him with Stephan, in the moment of Francois' accidental death. She will always make her believe her father is Francois.
plot_en: Amelie thinks to the story behind her daughter's father, Francois: she cheated on him with Stephan, in the moment of Francois' accidental death. She will always make her believe her father is Francois.
